attributes.additional_details:
http://www.change.org/en-GB/petitions/ban-the-sale-of-legal-highs-to-our-children-stop-the-illegal-selling-of-legal-highs-to-children?utm_campaign=twitter_link&utm_medium=twitter&utm_source=share_petition

These legal highs are being sold to children! My 14 yr old nephew bough some from a shop in Brighton, gave them to my 16 yr old nephew, who took them and was rushed to hospital in an ambulance foaming at the mouth! In leeds a stall holder was successfully prosecuted for selling legal highs to a 16yr old boy, he was only given a conditional discharge! Surely this is negligent and causing harm to children? Harsher punishments are needed and to be banned!
